user_request: Show the shopping cart on amazon. Add "macbook air" to the cart on amazon
screen_desc: The screenshot shows the Amazon mobile website with a search bar at the top, allowing users to search products. Below the search bar, there are various categories and deals, including a banner for "Early Black Friday deals" and a section for holiday gifts. The page also highlights sections like "Oculus" and "Women's Fashion." The lower part of the screen displays a "Home & Kitchen Under $30" section.
history_actions: click on the "Chrome" browser app icon located at the lower right part of the screen.
click on the browser's address/URL bar located at the middle and top part of the screen.
click on the second search suggestion located at middle and upper part of the screen.

think.Thought: The user has already navigated to the Amazon homepage on the mobile browser. To show the shopping cart, I need to focus on the cart icon located in the top-right corner of the screen. Once the cart is opened, I will then proceed to add 'MacBook Air' to the cart. The next step is to tap on the shopping cart icon to view the cart contents.
Future Action Plan: Tap on the shopping cart icon in the top-right corner of the screen.
